description:
The Alverstone II Wide GTX is designed to provide a lightweight, yet sturdy fit for challenging terrain. The Wide Last version for broader feet provides more room at the forefoot and ball of the foot. Thanks to its innovative, LFX (Lateral Flex) construction, it’s the ideal choice for long summit trips and multi-day alpine treks. The modern, shock-absorbing Vibram® sole construction with lower stack height provides additional stability in rugged terrain. And the GORE-TEX lining keeps your feet dry in wet and snowy conditions.

*** All Hanwag boots are sold under UK sizing - Please see size chart for details/conversion
name: HanWag Alverstone II GTX, Wide - Mens
